com.rscja.deviceapi

Class R1HFAndPsamManage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rscja.deviceapi.R1HFAndPsamManage

  • public class R1HFAndPsamManage
extends java.lang.Object
    R1设备高频和PSAM操作类
    R1 device HF and PSAM operation interfaces

    第一步:通过connect(Context context) 连接读写器。
    Step 1: Connect to the usb of the reader viaconnect(Context context)

    第二步:获取相关接口对象getHF14443A()、getHF14443B()、getHF15693()、getPSAM()
    Step 2:Gets the associated interface object getHF14443A()、getHF14443B()、getHF15693()、getPSAM()



    Example Usage:
    public void HFDemo() {   R1HFAndPsamManage rfid = R1HFAndPsamManage.getInstance();   if (!rfid.connect(context)) {    //fail    return;   }   IHF14443A ihf14443A = rfid.getHF14443A();   IHF14443B ihf14443B = rfid.getHF14443B();   IHF15693 ihf15693 = rfid.getHF15693();   IPSAM ipsam = rfid.getPSAM();   HF14443RequestEntity entity = ihf14443A.requestTypeA();   if (entity == null) {    //"Card not found!"    return;   }   byte cMode = 0x60:A ; 0x61:B   byte cBlock;   byte[] txtKey;//6bytes   boolean reuslt = ihf14443A.authentication(cMode, cBlock, txtKey);   if (!reuslt) {    //The key validation fail    return;   }   //................   rfid.disconnect();   }
